addresses.docs:
**, list of IPv4 addresses**: One or more IP addresses to broadcast data to. Defaults to `255.255.255.255` which is the local network broadcast address.

*See also: [UDP Component](https://esphome.io/components/udp.html#configuration-variables)*

binary_sensors.docs:
**, list**: A list of binary sensor IDs to be broadcast.
  * **id** (**Required**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)): The id of the binary sensor to be used
  
  * **broadcast_id** (*Optional*, string): The id to be used for this binary sensor in the broadcast. Defaults to the same as the internal id.
  
  

*See also: [UDP Component](https://esphome.io/components/udp.html#configuration-variables)*

encryption.docs:
**, string**: The encryption key to use when broadcasting. Default is no encryption. This may be any string, and will be hashed to form a 256 bit key.

*See also: [UDP Component](https://esphome.io/components/udp.html#configuration-variables)*

id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID used for code generation.

*See also: [UDP Component](https://esphome.io/components/udp.html#configuration-variables)*

listen_address.docs:
**, IPv4 address**: Changes to multicast, adding an address to listen to. Defaults to no multicast address, just local network broadcast address `255.255.255.255`. **NOTE**: Adding a multicast address stops it from listening on the broadcast address.

*See also: [UDP Component](https://esphome.io/components/udp.html#configuration-variables)*

ping_pong_enable.docs:
**, boolean**: When set, requires encrypted providers to include a *nonce* generated by this device in broadcasts. Defaults to `false`. Can be set only on the consumer side.

*See also: [UDP Component](https://esphome.io/components/udp.html#configuration-variables)*

port.docs:
**, int**: The destination UDP port number to use. Defaults to `18511`.

*See also: [UDP Component](https://esphome.io/components/udp.html#configuration-variables)*

rolling_code_enable.docs:
**, boolean**: Enables a rolling code to be included in all broadcasts. Requires `encryption` to be set. Defaults to `false`. Can be set only on the provider side.

*See also: [UDP Component](https://esphome.io/components/udp.html#configuration-variables)*

sensors.docs:
**, list**: A list of sensor IDs to be broadcast. Each entry may be just the sensor id, or may set a different id to be broadcast.
  * **id** (**Required**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)): The id of the sensor to be used
  
  * **broadcast_id** (*Optional*, string): The id to be used for this sensor in the broadcast. Defaults to the same as the internal id.
  
  

*See also: [UDP Component](https://esphome.io/components/udp.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**, [Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: Interval between full broadcasts. Defaults to 15s.

*See also: [UDP Component](https://esphome.io/components/udp.html#configuration-variables)*
